title: Select Budget Committee Session II 7/15/20
description:
In-person attendance is currently prohibited per the Washington Governor's Proclamation No. 20-28.7, et seq., until August 1, 2020. Meeting participation is limited to access by telephone conference line and Seattle Channel online.

Agenda: Res 31957: establishing a spending plan (continued); Issue Identification: 2020 Proposed Rebalancing Package.

Advance to a specific part:
Res 31957: establishing a spending plan (continued) - 1:15

Issue Identification: 2020 Proposed Rebalancing Package: First Presenters: Kirstan Arestad, Director, Greg Doss, Lise Kaye, Tom Mikesell, and Jeff Simms,Council Central Staff - 33:46

Issue Identification: 2020 Proposed Rebalancing Package: Second Presenters: Nikkita Oliver and Angélica Cházaro, Decriminalize Seattle; Shaun Glaze and Isaac Joy, King County Equity Now - 1:59:15
